name: Sir Arthur
overview: A Ghosts ‘n Goblins game for the Commodore 64 made in PETSCII, released 2022. If you loved playing the classic game of Ghosts 'n Goblins or Ghouls 'N Ghosts, then this latest version of the game for the C64 is pretty damn cool as not only is it a great nod to the classics, but think of it as a demake while made in PETSCII.
